pullrequest.title: Added basis for runviewer marker functionality

content.raw:
I would argue that a device is the wrong place for storing this information, because a device would imply unnecessary code in the experiment. Please correct me if I'm wrong but a device would need to be added to the connection table and I don't see any purpose in that. Also why create a whole object just for the purpose of storing a simple dict? 
I think markers should be something that you can easily be added to a experiment and a function does just that.
As for storing the data in a tabular manner I guess that wouldn't hurt.

I don't think h5 hard links are necessary as I can just add backwards compatibility in the runviewer code.
Maybe I expressed myself in a wrong way there. To be clear I can certainly accept changes to the storing mechanism but I really think there should be good reasoning behind it.
